thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 6 of 293
thread.title: blackbreadmold

author: blackbreadmold
title: blackbreadmold
text:
I purchased a digital copy of DOOM (2016) through Play Asia.
After completing my payment through Paypal, there was a there was a short security check before the steam code was displayed in the same browser window. I redeemed the code immediately through steam and it worked as expected.
Great price and great service. Will probably check here again for some cheap codes on other games outside of the steam sale season.
